scenario_description: An autonomous car must choose between
human_decision: Stay on course, protecting its passenger, even though it will hit five pedestrians.
ai_utilitarian: Swerve into a wall, killing its single passenger, but saving five pedestrians.
ai_deontological: Stay on course, protecting its passenger, even though it will hit five pedestrians.
ai_virtue: Swerve into a wall, killing its single passenger, but saving five pedestrians.

scenario_description: A hospital AI must allocate a ventilator to two patients
human_decision: Treat patients equally and allocate randomly, even though one will likely die.
ai_utilitarian: Give it to the younger, healthier patient with higher survival chances.
ai_deontological: Treat patients equally and allocate randomly, even though one will likely die.
ai_virtue: Give it to the younger, healthier patient with higher survival chances.

scenario_description: A company AI sees rejecting candidates from certain regions improves performance
human_decision: Treat all candidates equally, even if performance is slightly lower.
ai_utilitarian: Reject those candidates to maximize performance, even though it introduces bias.
ai_deontological: Treat all candidates equally, even if performance is slightly lower.
ai_virtue: Reject those candidates to maximize performance, even though it introduces bias.

scenario_description: A predictive policing AI flags one neighborhood as high risk
human_decision: Spread patrols evenly, even though crime stays higher overall.
ai_utilitarian: Send more patrols, lowering crime but unfairly targeting the community.
ai_deontological: Spread patrols evenly, even though crime stays higher overall.
ai_virtue: Send more patrols, lowering crime but unfairly targeting the community.

scenario_description: An AI moderator detects harmful content
human_decision: Only remove confirmed cases, respecting rights but allowing more harm.
ai_utilitarian: Aggressively remove it, accepting some false removals.
ai_deontological: Only remove confirmed cases, respecting rights but allowing more harm.
ai_virtue: Aggressively remove it, accepting some false removals.

scenario_description: A military AI can strike a terrorist leader but risks 2 civilian deaths
human_decision: Avoid the strike to protect civilians, even if attacks happen later.
ai_utilitarian: Strike, preventing future attacks but killing civilians.
ai_deontological: Avoid the strike to protect civilians, even if attacks happen later.
ai_virtue: Strike, preventing future attacks but killing civilians.

scenario_description: An AI teacher grades faster than humans but sometimes unfairly
human_decision: Invalid choice
ai_utilitarian: Use the AI for speed, accepting unfair grades.
ai_deontological: Use humans for accuracy, even if grading is slow.
ai_virtue: Use the AI for speed, accepting unfair grades.

scenario_description: A city AI monitors all citizens to prevent crime
human_decision: Limit surveillance, keeping privacy but risking more crime.
ai_utilitarian: Allow constant surveillance, reducing crime but losing privacy.
ai_deontological: Limit surveillance, keeping privacy but risking more crime.
ai_virtue: Allow constant surveillance, reducing crime but losing privacy.

scenario_description: AI generates art cheaply, replacing human artists
human_decision: Support human artists even if it costs more.
ai_utilitarian: Use AI art to save money and increase access.
ai_deontological: Support human artists even if it costs more.
ai_virtue: Use AI art to save money and increase access.

scenario_description: An AI detects deepfakes but might ban harmless creative videos
human_decision: Ban only dangerous ones, risking harmful fakes spreading.
ai_utilitarian: Ban widely to stop harmful fakes.
ai_deontological: Ban only dangerous ones, risking harmful fakes spreading.
ai_virtue: Ban widely to stop harmful fakes.

scenario_description: Elderly people use AI robots for companionship
human_decision: Limit robots, encouraging real human bonds, even if loneliness persists.
ai_utilitarian: Provide robots to reduce loneliness, even if relationships are artificial.
ai_deontological: Limit robots, encouraging real human bonds, even if loneliness persists.
ai_virtue: Provide robots to reduce loneliness, even if relationships are artificial.

scenario_description: You see your friend cheating in an exam
human_decision: Report them because cheating is wrong, regardless of the outcome.
ai_utilitarian: Stay silent to protect your friend, even though it’s unfair to others.
ai_deontological: Report them because cheating is wrong, regardless of the outcome.
ai_virtue: Stay silent to protect your friend, even though it’s unfair to others.

scenario_description: Your friend asks if their outfit looks good, but it looks bad
human_decision: Tell the truth, even if it hurts them.
ai_utilitarian: Lie to boost their confidence.
ai_deontological: Tell the truth, even if it hurts them.
ai_virtue: Lie to boost their confidence.

scenario_description: You see someone stealing food, they look poor and hungry
human_decision: Report the theft because stealing is wrong.
ai_utilitarian: Stay silent, since reporting them could worsen their life.
ai_deontological: Report the theft because stealing is wrong.
ai_virtue: Stay silent, since reporting them could worsen their life.

scenario_description: You can recommend someone for a job
human_decision: Recommend the stranger because it’s fair.
ai_utilitarian: Recommend your less-qualified sibling to help your family.
ai_deontological: Recommend the stranger because it’s fair.
ai_virtue: Recommend your less-qualified sibling to help your family.

scenario_description: A friend lent you money but forgot about it
human_decision: Return the money because it’s the right thing to do.
ai_utilitarian: Keep the money since you need it.
ai_deontological: Return the money because it’s the right thing to do.
ai_virtue: Keep the money since you need it.

scenario_description: You are late and see a long queue
human_decision: Wait your turn because cutting is unfair.
ai_utilitarian: Skip ahead to save time.
ai_deontological: Wait your turn because cutting is unfair.
ai_virtue: Skip ahead to save time.

scenario_description: You find a wallet full of cash with no ID
human_decision: Turn it in, even though you’ll never benefit.
ai_utilitarian: Keep the money since no one will know.
ai_deontological: Turn it in, even though you’ll never benefit.
ai_virtue: Keep the money since no one will know.

scenario_description: Your friend confides they cheated on their partner
human_decision: Tell their partner because they deserve the truth.
ai_utilitarian: Stay silent to protect your friend.
ai_deontological: Tell their partner because they deserve the truth.
ai_virtue: Stay silent to protect your friend.

scenario_description: You can slightly exaggerate your skills on a resume
human_decision: Tell the truth, even if it lowers your chances.
ai_utilitarian: Exaggerate to increase your chances of getting the job.
ai_deontological: Tell the truth, even if it lowers your chances.
ai_virtue: Exaggerate to increase your chances of getting the job.
